function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Artificial environmental conditions associated with chronic diseases, allergies, and syndromes such as sick building syndrome","Impact":"Increased incidence of chronic diseases, allergies, and sick building syndrome","Mitigation":"Re-design building spaces to incorporate natural elements like sunshine, natural ventilation, and connections to nature","Technologies":"Biophilic design, green infrastructure, natural ventilation systems","People":"Individuals living and working in indoor spaces","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, building designers"},{"Description":"Lack of physical activity due to indoor sedentary lifestyles","Impact":"Increased risk of chronic diseases such as coronary heart disease, type II diabetes, and colon cancer","Mitigation":"Incorporate physical activity into daily routines, e.g. by installing treadmills underneath workstations","Technologies":"Treadmill workstations, active design principles","People":"People with sedentary indoor jobs","Owner":"Employers, office planners, health professionals"},{"Description":"Dependence on artificial systems for lighting and ventilation","Impact":"Reduced connection to natural environmental conditions and potential health impacts","Mitigation":"Use natural lighting and ventilation systems in building design, prioritize biophilic design principles","Technologies":"Natural lighting systems, passive design strategies, biophilic design elements","People":"People living and working in artificially lit and ventilated spaces","Owner":"Architects, building designers, environmental consultants"}]}
